body_text:
We learned in this PR that when we upgraded some things the only way we noticed that viewing the django-rest-framework rendering in HTML was by running it locally and opening it in a browser. Sadness.
The testing of the rendering of HTML via django-rest-framework should be part of the test suite.

title: Unit tests don't test our HTML format in django-rest-framework
body:
We learned in [this PR](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/1204#issuecomment-371318101) that when we upgraded some things the only way we noticed that viewing the django-rest-framework rendering in HTML was by running it locally and opening it in a browser. Sadness. 

The testing of the rendering of HTML via django-rest-framework should be part of the test suite.
